(Simplified: 缄)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 咸 indicates the sound; 糹 (silk) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 咸 [ xián ] all, together, united; salted
①捆東西的繩索。
②書信：緘素。緘扎。
③封，閉：緘口。緘制(封鎖)。緘封。緘密。緘默。
緘默 [ jiān mò ]: to keep silent
緘口不言 [ jiān kǒu bù yán ]: lips sealed and not saying anything (idiom); fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic); to censor
(Simplified: 缄)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 咸 indicates the sound; 糹 (silk) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 缄

Traditional in your browser 繁体字的浏览器显示:緘

Older traditional characters 旧繁体字/异体字: Not exist

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:缄

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+7F04

Main pronunciation 主要发音: jiān

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning seal or bind or letter.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 三緘其口 sān jiān qí kǒu (with one's lips sealed)

Importance by frequency 常用频率:

Shuowen 说文解字: 束篋也從糸咸聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 緘 from single-thread (纟)糹 mì and phonetic united-kill 咸 xián C258 緘<椷> simp 缄.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :

Variant rule clarification :

Applied rules : R04 纟糹糸

緘字的基本解释

緘
jiān
见“缄”。

緘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《廣韻》古咸切，平咸，見。］
“缄1”的繁体字。“咸2”的被通假字。
(1)扎束器物的绳。
(2)特指束棺之绳。参见“緘繩”、“緘縢”。
(3)束缚；捆扎。
(4)闭藏；封闭。
(5)收；敛。
(6)遮蔽。
(7)书函。
(8)为书信封口。
(9)量词。用于信件等装封套之物。犹封，件。

緘字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　緘； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页930第02
【廣韻】古咸切【集韻】【韻會】居咸切，?音監。【說文】束篋也。【廣韻】緘封。【家語】孔子觀周廟，有金人，三緘其口。【莊子·齊物論】其厭也如緘。　又【集韻】公陷切，減去聲。棺旁所以繫縴者。　又與咸通。【禮·喪大記】大夫士以咸。【註】咸讀爲緘也。【釋名】棺束曰緘。緘，函也，古者棺不釘也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Guangyun" ancient Xian cut, flat Xian, see. ]
Traditional characters for "缄1". "Xian 2" was passed falsely.
(1) The rope that binds the utensils.
(2) Especially refers to the rope that binds the coffin. See "string rope", "缄縢".
(3) Binding; strapping.
(4) Closed possession; closed.
(5) Collect; converge.
(6) Shading.
(7) Letters.
(8) is the book envelope opening.
(9) Quantifiers. Used for envelopes such as letters. Still sealed, pieces.
seal
